items.title: Vala Website (2022)
items.content:
I created a website for a programming language called Vala.

It replaces an old set of wiki pages with a website that:

  • Showcases Vala projects and features
  • Shows off the language's branding
  • Is optimised for speed
  • Has improved accessibility (especially regarding navigation and colour contrast).

items.title: Jailtime
items.thumbnail_alt_text: Jailtime - Blocks websites and helps keep you focused
items.content:
A browser extension that blocks websites by allowing you to add sites to a block list, making you more productive!

Available on both Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox.

items.title: Yachting Partners International (2021 Redesign)
items.content: Covers all aspects of yacht services such as brokerage, chartering and management. I was the front-end developer for this project.

items.title: Pomodoro Timer UWP
items.thumbnail_alt_text: A program with a timer showing the current time left in minutes and seconds.
items.content: A pomodoro timer app with features like "always-on-top" mode, background support and the ability to customise your each interval and how many sessions you'll have.

items.title: Dysprose
items.thumbnail_alt_text: A program allowing the user to type in it, with a circular timer going down.
items.content:
A Windows 10 Application for times when your ideas aren't coming together/you need to focus.

Start a session where you have to keep typing within a regular interval or risk all your work fading away right in front of you then save your work at the end.

items.title: Audio Trimmer
items.thumbnail_alt_text: A program allowing the user to select parts of audio to keep with trimming controls
items.content:
A Windows 10 Application that gives users a simple, seamless way to trim audio files.

The app takes care of copying metadata and supporting file formats so all the user has to worry about is keeping the parts of an audio file that they want!
